message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $15000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I can do $14000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I can meet you at $13500, but I'll throw in a small bonus - I'll include a premium service package worth $500 for free. Would you be willing to accept that deal?
